code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Payslips(){const[payrolls,setPayrolls]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetch('/api/payrolls/1').then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>setPayrolls(data));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-8",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-xl font-semibold mb-4",children:"Payslips"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"space-y-2",children:payrolls.map(p=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"border p-2 rounded",children:[p.month,"/",p.year,": \xA3",p.net," net"]},p.id))})]});}export default Payslips;
